Posts.Content: Runnergurl wrote: I've been on Tamoxifen for about a month. I do not have breast cancer, however my two sisters (one is my twin) and my Mom all have had BC. We are all BRCA negative. Previous to my start of the drug, my doctor had told me she wanted me to lose weight. I am seeing a nutritionist and following her plan, but the weight is hanging on. I am VERY active so this is a bit troubling. Anyone have this issue? Have you figured out a way to "get around this"?. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and Weight Runnergurl exercise_guru

Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2018 08:14AM Runnergurl wrote: For a few months before I started Tamoxifen. The nutrition plan did not start until a few weeks before going on the meds,
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and Weight Runnergurl exercise_guru

Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2018 05:47AM Runnergurl wrote:  saxendacare dot com
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and Weight Runnergurl exercise_guru

Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2018 05:50AM Runnergurl wrote: The link I got was for a medication for weight loss. Not something I'm interested in. You can sign up and "learn" other thing about weight loss, but I'm already seeing a nutritionist. I am VERY active (workout 5-7 times a week, including running). The weight is just hanging on. I "think" I've lost a little bit in body mass since my clothes see a bit looser. I see my oncologist in 6 weeks and have my thyroid checked next month. Just going to soldier on. If you want the link, PM me and I will get it to you.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and Weight Runnergurl exercise_guru
